product_name: Pepper's Lone Star Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Keep your eyes shielded with the Pepper's Lone Star sunglasses, featuring polarized lenses for superior visual clarity. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Tuff-Core Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Matte black frames feature polarized smoke gray lenses for 100% UV protection that won't distort colors. Pepper's Lone Star polarized sunglasses are sized for large faces.
short_description: Keep your eyes shielded with the Pepper's Lone Star sunglasses, featuring polarized lenses for superior visual clarity.
